publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1258.1.1 Maureen Watt: Education—As an amendment to amendment (S3M-1258.1) in the name of Elizabeth Smith, insert at end "and further notes that future plans for school buildings will be usefully informed by the imminent publication of Audit Scotland’s report on improving the Scottish school estate and the Scottish Government’s proposals for the Scottish Futures Trust and the Infrastructure Investment Plan." Supported by: Adam Ingram*
